item.title: Linux Command - Grep
item.description: 使用正则表达式搜索文件内容 macOS cat nc-auth_3000.log | grep -s 'timeCost":\d\d\d\d' centOS cat nc-auth_3000.log | grep -P 'timeCost":\d\d\d\d' 使用正则表达式搜索压缩文件内容 macOS gzip -dc nc-auth_3000.20211106.38.log.gz | grep -s 'timeCost":\d\d\d\d' centOS gzip -dc nc-auth_3000.20211106.38.log.gz | grep -P 'timeCost":\d\d\d\d'
